title: Can we PLEASE add a report in lobby function?
body:
Seriously "I have 20+ accounts in high diamond and master I can be as much of a dick as I want on the internet"
These people do not deserve to get away with this shit I shouldn't have to sit through 20-40 minutes of my life with this guy just to report him.

replies.body: riot actually **DOES** punish people for pre-game/postgame chat, as long as you report it and dictate within the report that the said offense occured in pregame/postgame chat.
I wonder does taking a screenshot of the lobby work as well for proof? You are technically still on your browser, why not use your normal desktop screenshot?
I think the point the OP is making is that they don't want to have to play through a match with this person to report them (without going through the process of creating a ticket).
This should be a function we can use, but I feel it would be used as an excuse to just entirely avoid games with certain players, which could be bad or good.

See the report wouldn't like dodge the game for you without any repercussion, it's just extremely frustrating that they can actually **get away** with this absolute bullshit they pull hoping that someone else dodges so they don't have to. It shouldn't be a viable strategy to be a horrible person pre-game so that your team dodges instead of you when you get the role you didn't want. At least this way, you can report the person so that maybe they get banned for their behavior.
